InstalledItem.Name: Stellate
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 4
Grade: Bespoke
Class: Civilian

Sakura Sun worked with Origin to fine tune the Stellate into the perfect power plant for the 890 Jump, providing the power and performance necessary for a ship of such grand design.

InstalledItem.Name: Glacis
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk
Size: 4
Grade: Bespoke
Class: Industrial

Origin turned to the experts at Basilisk to build a bespoke shield generator for the 890 Jump. The Glacis blends centuries of cutting edge innovation to produce a strong and stable shield capable of defending the valuable ship and passengers aboard.

InstalledItem.Name: Serac
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Wen/CasselÂ 
Size: 4
Grade: Bespoke
Class: Civilian

Only available for Origin Jumpworks' luxury liner, Wen/Cassel specially designed the Serac cooler to keep the 890 Jump operational through the diverse conditions typically encountered while cruising the stars.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weaponâs fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.
